statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.79}+{7.61}\right)}={28.8}\approx{28.8}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{7.61}\cdot{6.64}={50.5304}\approx{50.5}.
